title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/fo-newton.html
notes:
On Tue, Feb 11, 2014:


Dear Lonslo,


Re my previous e-mails, please expedite the necessary modalities to ensure that
our friend gets what he deserves after all his hard work.


Yours sincerely,
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Lonslo will make him sweat!


TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

messages.subject: PAYMENT NOTIFICATION
messages.body:
Chevron Texaco Oil and Gas Company Lottery Promotion
 Chevron House,30 Raffles Place, IL,USA (ASIA DISTRICT)
 IL,USA (ASIA DISTRICT)
 Our Reference: CHT 2010/19513-10.
 Our Batch: 24/00319/CHT
 Phone Number: +1(708) 949-6759


 PAYMENT NOTICE OF YOUR FUNDS


 May you remain favored.


 This letter will definitely be amazing to you because of its realistic value. Sorry for the inconveniences that was rendered to you in your line of Inheritance Payment transaction with some Nigerian Officials some while ago. Without taking much of your time, my name is Mr Seebeck Newton, the Honorable Paymaster General of The Federal Republic of Nigeria. Presently, were in partnership with the American government in averting Scams and also to avert beneficiary funds delays here in Nigeria, So far, we have succeeded in Settling the likes of (Mrs. Ann Keyser, Mr. Edward Drake etc) their inheritant funds which was previously delayed.


 Your Funds were returned to the Federal Government Treasury some while ago because you did not finalize your claim for it. A week ago, the Presidency and the Federal Executive Council collectively agreed to release the sum of US$850,000.00 to you but to our surprise you sent down your representatives Mr. Robert Jason and Mr. Jim Harrison to collect this Funds on your behalf, this morning.


 Since you sent your representatives to us, kindly give us the authority to transfer your Funds into their own Bank Account in Singapore.


 We await your immediate response via email and telephone But if you did not Authorize this claim then fill and submit this form right away to this department:


 FULL NAME:
 HOME ADDRESS:
 PHONE NUMBER:
 AGE:
 SEX:
 STATUS:
 OCCUPATION:
 COUNTRY:


 Officially Sealed,


 Chief.Seebeck Newton
 The Honorable Paymaster General.
messages.raw:
Seebeck Newton

From: vgonzalez@c.exactas.unca.edu.ar
Subject: PAYMENT NOTIFICATION
Date: Thu, 30 Jan 2014

Chevron Texaco Oil and Gas Company Lottery Promotion
Chevron House,30 Raffles Place, IL,USA (ASIA DISTRICT)
IL,USA (ASIA DISTRICT)
Our Reference: CHT 2010/19513-10.
Our Batch: 24/00319/CHT
Phone Number: +1(708) 949-6759

PAYMENT NOTICE OF YOUR FUNDS

May you remain favored.

This letter will definitely be amazing to you because of its realistic value. Sorry for the inconveniences that was rendered to you in your line of Inheritance Payment transaction with some Nigerian Officials some while ago. Without taking much of your time, my name is Mr Seebeck Newton, the Honorable Paymaster General of The Federal Republic of Nigeria. Presently, were in partnership with the American government in averting Scams and also to avert beneficiary funds delays here in Nigeria, So far, we have succeeded in Settling the likes of (Mrs. Ann Keyser, Mr. Edward Drake etc) their inheritant funds which was previously delayed.

Your Funds were returned to the Federal Government Treasury some while ago because you did not finalize your claim for it. A week ago, the Presidency and the Federal Executive Council collectively agreed to release the sum of US$850,000.00 to you but to our surprise you sent down your representatives Mr. Robert Jason and Mr. Jim Harrison to collect this Funds on your behalf, this morning.

Since you sent your representatives to us, kindly give us the authority to transfer your Funds into their own Bank Account in Singapore.

We await your immediate response via email and telephone But if you did not Authorize this claim then fill and submit this form right away to this department:

FULL NAME:
HOME ADDRESS:
PHONE NUMBER:
AGE:
SEX:
STATUS:
OCCUPATION:
COUNTRY:

Reply to: headquater@qq.com
Officially Sealed,

Chief.Seebeck Newton
The Honorable Paymaster General.

[Your basic "you should have received your inheritance but WE'LL help you" format]

messages.body:
Dear Sirs,


Re Your E-Mail of 30 January 2014


I am somewhat puzzled by this message. It was sent by a Ms Yang yet the address is
vgonzalez@c.exactas.unca.edu.ar


And I have been asked to reply to headquater@qq.com!


However, I am replying to 'Barrister Andrew Office'.


Perhaps Mr Office can explain the situation to me before I proceed any further.


Yours faithfully,


Sir Tushie Meshuganah AA RAC BSc 
President Emeritus
Kreplach Brothers Merchant Bank International
Aspis House
69 Edelson Avenue
London WC1 FU2
United Kingdom
messages.raw:
Tushie Meshuganah

Dear Sirs,

Re Your E-Mail of 30 January 2014

I am somewhat puzzled by this message. It was sent by a Ms Yang yet the address is vgonzalez@c.exactas.unca.edu.ar

And I have been asked to reply to headquater@qq.com!

However, I am replying to 'Barrister Andrew Office'.

Perhaps Mr Office can explain the situation to me before I proceed any further.

Yours faithfully,

Sir Tushie Meshuganah AA RAC BSc [Economics]
President Emeritus
Kreplach Brothers Merchant Bank International
Aspis House
69 Edelson Avenue
London WC1 FU2
United Kingdom

messages.subject: Re: PAYMENT NOTIFICATION
messages.body:
TELEX: FEDGOVNIG.
 PAYMENT FILE: FGN/BEN/14.
 *****24hrs Service *****
 Phone Number: +1(708) 949-6759
 Date:30TH JAN 2014


 Attention Tushie Meshuganah


 Being the paymaster general of the federal Republic i will like to
 enlighten you that funds your shall be remitted into your Bank account
 and not by check for security reasons or via atm card.


 The Federal Executive Council (FEC) and The Presidency of The Federal
 Republic held a very crucial symposium today in regards to this said
 Funds and in conclusion to it, we have collectively decided to
 enlighten you on the accurate step to take, for you to gain full
 possession of this Funds.


 Hence you decently denied that you did not send these foreigners to
 collect your Funds on your behalf then you will have to complete your
 claim now because this is your only opportunity for you to do so. This
 is actually the right time for you to have this Funds wired directly
 into your Bank Account without a hitch.


 From the content of the Legal Documents which Mr. Robert Jason and Mr.
 Jim Harrison tendered to us, we are mandated to release this same
 Funds to them within 72hrs from today dated the 28TH Jan. 2014, but
 considering the fact that your name is on our "Payment Reference
 System", we will advise that a "Presidential Authorization
 Certificate" be obtained by you with your name from The President's
 Office here because such is the only Document that can enable you to
 gain access to this Funds for the fact that two claims have already
 been filed-in for this same Funds in question.



 We want you to understand that you have to procure the presidential
 authorization certificate for the approval of the transfer of your
 fund into your account without any delay this certificate will cost
 you 250usd for the procurement fee as soon as the payment is confirm
 the certificate will be approve for the transfer of your fund


 In receipt of this Official Letter, you are advised to forward the
 below information to us today and procure the presidential
 authorization certificate of the fund so that your fund can be
 transfer into your account or via atm card


 you are required to call this Legal Office immediately you receive
 this Confidential Letter.
 Officially Sealed,
 Mr Seebeck Newton
messages.raw:
Seebeck Newton

Date: Thu, 30 Jan 2014 21:25:11 +0100
Subject: Re: PAYMENT NOTIFICATION
From: barristerandrewoffice@gmail.com
To: Tushie Meshuganah

TELEX: FEDGOVNIG.
PAYMENT FILE: FGN/BEN/14.
*****24hrs Service *****
Phone Number: +1(708) 949-6759
Date:30TH JAN 2014

Attention Tushie Meshuganah

Being the paymaster general of the federal Republic i will like to enlighten you that funds your shall be remitted into your Bank account and not by check for security reasons or via atm card.

The Federal Executive Council (FEC) and The Presidency of The Federal Republic held a very crucial symposium today in regards to this said Funds and in conclusion to it, we have collectively decided to enlighten you on the accurate step to take, for you to gain full possession of this Funds.

Hence you decently denied that you did not send these foreigners to collect your Funds on your behalf then you will have to complete your claim now because this is your only opportunity for you to do so. This is actually the right time for you to have this Funds wired directly into your Bank Account without a hitch.

From the content of the Legal Documents which Mr. Robert Jason and Mr. Jim Harrison tendered to us, we are mandated to release this same Funds to them within 72hrs from today dated the 28TH Jan. 2014, but considering the fact that your name is on our "Payment Reference System", we will advise that a "Presidential Authorization Certificate" be obtained by you with your name from The President's Office here because such is the only Document that can enable you to gain access to this Funds for the fact that two claims have already been filed-in for this same Funds in question.

[He gets down to it:]

We want you to understand that you have to procure the presidential authorization certificate for the approval of the transfer of your fund into your account without any delay this certificate will cost you 250usd for the procurement fee as soon as the payment is confirm the certificate will be approve for the transfer of your fund

In receipt of this Official Letter, you are advised to forward the below information to us today and procure the presidential authorization certificate of the fund so that your fund can be transfer into your account or via atm card

you are required to call this Legal Office immediately you receive this Confidential Letter.
Officially Sealed,
Mr Seebeck Newton

messages.body:
Dear Mr Newton,


I am in receipt of your e-mail of January 30.


What is the value of the funds due to be remitted to me by the Federal Executive Council?


Yours sincerely,


SIR TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
President Emeritus
Kreplach Brothers Merchant Bank International PLC

Tushie Meshuganah

What is the value of the funds due to be remitted to me by the Federal Executive Council?

Yours sincerely,

SIR TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
President Emeritus
Kreplach Brothers Merchant Bank International PLC

February 4,2014


Dear Mr Andrew,


$250 seems a reasonable fee and this will be remitted to you on the understanding that
there will be no further charges for the presidential certificate.


Let me have your bank details and my secretary Ms Estelle MacBeth will make an electronic transfer
tomorrow morning. 


Yours truly,


SIR TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
President Emeritus
Kreplach Brothers Merchant Bank International PLC

I will await your response


Mr Seebeck Newton

4 February 2014


Dear Mr Newton,


As Paymaster General of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, you must surely be aware that an electronic
bank transfer is the safest and quickest way for any payments to be made.


SIR TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
President Emeritus
Kreplach Brothers Merchant Bank PLC

messages.body:
5 February 2014


Dear Mr Newton,


Thank you for your e-mail which I received earlier this morning.


However, you have not answered the point I made yesterday which I now repeat:


As Paymaster General of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, you must surely be aware that an electronic
bank transfer is the safest and quickest way for any payments to be made. 


Therefore there is no need to use Western Union or Money Gram. Simply send me your bank details.
messages.raw:
Tushie Meshuganah

5 February 2014

Dear Mr Newton,

Thank you for your e-mail which I received earlier this morning.

However, you have not answered the point I made yesterday which I now repeat:

As Paymaster General of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, you must surely be aware that an electronic bank transfer is the safest and quickest way for any payments to be made.

Therefore there is no need to use Western Union or Money Gram. Simply send me your bank details.

Attention Tushie Meshuganah


Thank you for your email Tushie i have answered your email and i told you that it the fast and quickest but as i have informed you my brother we do not accept T/T as we accept western union or money gram so Tushie you need to follow the instruction i gave to you.you can provide to me your phone number so we can speak on the phone.


Thank you and God Bless you my brother 


Mr Seebeck Newton

messages.body:
Cc: 	Lonslo Tossov


	6 February 2014


Dear Mr Newton,


Use of Western Union would be a most irregular procedure.


However, as I have been retired for some years I am passing this correspondence
to our Chief Cashier Mr Lonslo Tossov who will contact you about how we might be
able to proceed with this business


SIR TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
President Emeritus
Kreplach Brothers Merchant Bank PLC

messages.body:
Cc: 	Lonslo Tossov  


	17 February 2014


Dear Mr Newton,


My Chief Cashier, Mr Lonslo Tossov, informs me that you have not replied to his e-mail of February 12.


Mr Tossov assures me that we have the MTCN number of the Western Union transfer. So please acknowledge receipt of the US$250 to either myself or Mr Tossov without delay.





 




scamorama main street 
* 
get booked 
*
messages.raw:
Tushie Meshuganah

Date: February 17, 2014 7:43:37 AM PST
Cc: Lonslo Tossov

17 February 2014

Dear Mr Newton,

My Chief Cashier, Mr Lonslo Tossov, informs me that you have not replied to his e-mail of February 12.

Mr Tossov assures me that we have the MTCN number of the Western Union transfer. So please acknowledge receipt of the US$250 to either myself or Mr Tossov without delay.

[ More to come? ]
